TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowParameterBinding extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: A general-purpose class that represents a binding to a named parameter. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
The binding is to the source of an `in` parameter, or the target of an `out` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates creating a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding> object. This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample. For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string parameterName) cil managed

Docs.param: A that contains the name of the parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the ParameterName property. Represents the name of the parameter being bound.
Docs.value: The name of the parameter being bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is the user-defined name of the parameter to which the binding applies.

## Remarks Each of the public `properties` and `events` of this type is accessed indirectly by the resolution of a corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>. This is the `public static field` named `XProperty`, respectively `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding `property`,respectively `event`.
[!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/add/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value assigned to the corresponding parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each of the public `properties` and `events` of this type is accessed indirectly by the resolution of a corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>. This is the `public static field` named `XProperty`, respectively `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding `property`, respectively `event`.
